name: MkDocs (via pipx)
description: MkDocs is a fast, simple and downright gorgeous static site generator that's geared towards building project documentation.

version.description: Select the version of MKDocs to install.

mkdocsMaterialPlugin.description: Select the version of mkdocs-material-plugin to install. 'none' will skip installation.

pymdownExtensionsPlugin.description: Select the version of pymdown-extensions-plugin to install. 'none' will skip installation.

mkdocstringsPlugin.description: Select the version of mkdocstrings-plugin to install. 'none' will skip installation.

mkdocsMonorepoPlugin.description: Select the version of mkdocs-monorepo-plugin to install. 'none' will skip installation.

mkdocsPdfExportPlugin.description: Select the version of mkdocs-pdf-export-plugin to install. 'none' will skip installation.

mkdocsAwesomePagesPlugin.description: Select the version of mkdocs-awesome-pages-plugin to install. 'none' will skip installation.
